scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Cecelia
scrape.text: With this being heralded as "The European Gone Girl," maybe I should have tempered my expectations (I only modestly enjoyed Gone Girl), but I thought this was just OK. There was essentially no suspense until the second half of the book, and the only reason I kept reading was that it was short and a quick read. It's already not a long book, but I think I would have enjoyed it more as a short story or a novella.
